title: High-purity C3N quantum dots for enhancing fluorescence detection of metal ions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10749-10754
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00887A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Huan Yang, Changdao Han, Jie Jiang, Pei Li, Liang Chen
High-purity C3N QDs of a sensitive fluorescent response to various metal ions were synthesized by optimized solvothermal treatment with a yield up to 33.1%.
